Test Objective: Navigate to cart as guest user
Test Case Details: Verify guest users can access cart page and see appropriate messages
Post-Condition: User remains on cart page or is redirected
Expected Results: See alert message 'Please login to continue' or similar login requirement message

Test Objective: Add to cart functionality for guest user
Test Case Details: Verify guest users can add products to cart
Pre-Condition: User is on products page and not logged in
Test Steps: 1. Click 'Add to Cart' button for any product
Post-Condition: Item may be added to cart temporarily
Expected Results: See 'Added to cart!' alert and cart badge increment

Test Objective: View empty cart as logged-in user
Test Case Details: Verify logged-in user can see empty cart state
Pre-Condition: User is logged in and navigates to cart
Expected Results: See 'Your cart is empty' label, Total: $0.00, Subtotal: $0.00, and available buttons

Test Objective: Add products to cart and verify cart contents
Test Case Details: Verify logged-in user can add products and see them in cart
Test Steps: 1. Go to products page 2. Add product to cart 3. Navigate to cart
Expected Results: See product in cart with name, price, quantity, item total and correct calculations

Test Case Details: Verify user can increase item quantity and calculations update
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Click '+' button for an item
Expected Results: Item quantity increases, item total recalculates, cart subtotal and total update

Test Case Details: Verify user can decrease item quantity and calculations update
Pre-Condition: User has items in cart with quantity > 1
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Click '-' button for an item
Expected Results: Item quantity decreases, item total recalculates, cart subtotal and total update

Test Objective: Set specific item quantity in cart
Test Case Details: Verify user can set specific quantity and calculations update
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Enter specific quantity in quantity input
Expected Results: Item quantity updates, item total recalculates, cart subtotal and total update

Test Case Details: Verify user can remove individual items from cart
Pre-Condition: User has multiple items in cart
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Click 'Remove' button for an item
Expected Results: Selected item disappears, cart badge and calculations update accordingly

Test Case Details: Verify user can clear all items from cart
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Click 'Clear Cart' button
Post-Condition: All items are removed from cart
Expected Results: Cart becomes empty with appropriate empty state messages

Test Objective: Verify cart calculations have correct format
Test Case Details: Verify all monetary values follow $XX.XX format
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Observe all prices and totals
Expected Results: All prices, item totals, subtotal and total follow $XX.XX format with 2 decimal places

Test Objective: Proceed to checkout with cart items
Test Case Details: Verify checkout process works when cart has items
Pre-Condition: User has items in cart and is logged in
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to cart 2. Click 'Proceed to Checkout' button

Test Case Details: Verify user can enter shipping address
Test Steps: 1. Locate shipping address input 2. Enter valid address
Expected Results: Shipping address field accepts and retains the entered address

Test Objective: Cart badge count matches unique products
Test Case Details: Verify cart badge reflects unique products, not total items
Test Steps: 1. Add same product multiple times 2. Observe cart badge 3. Navigate to cart
Expected Results: Cart badge increases for unique products, quantity increases for same product

Test Case Details: Verify system handles invalid quantities appropriately
Expected Results: System handles invalid input gracefully without crashing

Test Case Details: Verify cart state persists after navigation
Test Steps: 1. Navigate away from cart 2. Return to cart
Expected Results: Cart contents and calculations remain unchanged after navigation
